user_description: Converts FASTA file to KBaseGenomeAnnotations.Assembly json string. Note the MD5 for the contig is generated by uppercasing the sequence. The Assembly MD5 is generated by taking the MD5 of joining the sorted list of individual contig MD5s with a comma separator
developer_description: Converts FASTA file to KBaseGenomeAnnotations.Assembly json string. Note the MD5 for the contig is generated by uppercasing the sequence. The Assembly MD5 is generated by taking the MD5 of joining the sorted list of individual contig MD5s with a comma separator

user_options.name: object_name
user_options.help: The name you would like to use to reference this Assembly.  If not supplied, will default to the name of the file.

user_options.name: source
user_options.help: Source of this Assembly data, e.g., JGI, Genbank, etc

user_options.name: taxon_reference
user_options.help: Use a reference to the taxon object if want to explicitly associate the assembly with a taxon object.
